title: Susan E Hunt, MD
description: Susan E Hunt, MD, Attending Physician, Assistant Clinical Professor
cleaned_text: Susan E Hunt, MD On staff since July 2011 Children's Title: Attending Physician Academic Title: Assistant Clinical Professor "As a combined Internal Medicine and Pediatrics physician and hospitalist, I have special interest in complex patients with conditions that started in childhood as they transition from pediatric-centered to adult-centered medical systems. In addition to attending on the Seattle Children's Medically Complex Child Service, I also attend at University of Washington Medical Center caring for adults and run a consultative clinic for young adults with medical complexity who are moving to adult-centered care. Helping patients, families and providers on both the pediatric to adult side care for these complex patients is challenging and rewarding." Overview - Board Certification(s) - Pediatrics Internal Medicine Pediatric Hospital Medicine - Medical/Professional School - University Hospital-Michigan, Ann Arbor, MI - Residency - Duke University, Durham, NC - Clinical Interests - Transitions from pediatric to adult care for patients with chronic illnesses of childhood onset; resident education
